channel.title: 《Repository for Nokia 770 to install Chinese fonts and themes》的评论

item.title: 作者：Nigel
item.dc:creator: Nigel
item.description:
Hello, I'm really sorry, but could someone post step-by-step instructions on how to get the firefly deb package and how to install it on the N800?
I'm really computer inept. Many thanks in advance for your help.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: 作者：arangel
item.dc:creator: arangel
item.description: Hi, is there a place where I can find more info about creating new locales? I want to create one for Macedonian and so far I didn't found anything much on google.. Thanks..
item.content:encoded: Hi, is there a place where I can find more info about creating new locales? I want to create one for Macedonian and so far I didn't found anything much on google.. Thanks..

item.title: 作者：chichi
item.dc:creator: chichi
item.description:
Just tried on N800. Steps to show all chinese except in title bar.
1) install the firefly deb package 2) open xterm 3) sudo gainroot 4) fc-cache -f
This way all applications will support chinese include opera
item.content:encoded:
Just tried on N800. Steps to show all chinese except in title bar.

1) install the firefly deb package
2) open xterm
3) sudo gainroot
4) fc-cache -f

This way all applications will support chinese include opera
